message.content: Now let me create the pull request again with the updated remote URL.

function.arguments:
{"repo_name": "sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes", "source_branch": "feat/code-review-cycle-microagent", "target_branch": "main", "title": "feat: Add code review cycle microagent", "body": "
## Description

This PR adds a new microagent for handling iterative code review cycles. The microagent provides guidance for:

1. **Systematic Review Process**: After creating a PR and marking it ready to review, wait 5 minutes for Google Code Assist and other agents to provide feedback
2. **Retry Mechanism**: If no comments are received after 5 minutes, wait 5 more minutes and try one last time
3. **Comprehensive Comment Addressing**: Thoroughly review and implement all feedback from code reviews
4. **Cycle Management**: Close the current PR and open a new one to trigger fresh reviews
5. **Maximum Iterations**: Repeat the cycle for a maximum of 10 iterations

## Changes Made

- Created `.openhands/microagents/code-review-cycle.md` with comprehensive documentation
- Implements the code review cycle workflow as specified
- Follows repository conventions and testing requirements

## Testing

- [x] Microagent file created with proper YAML frontmatter and markdown content
- Follows existing microagent structure and format

## Purpose

This microagent complements the existing PR Ready to Review and SheepVibes Rules microagents
- Provides structured guidance for automated code review processes
- Ensures proper handling of review comments and iterative improvements

## Related Issues

- N/A

## Notes

- Follows all repository testing requirements and validation workflows
- Ensures code quality by running full test suite before each PR creation
", "draft": "false", "labels": "enhancement,documentation"}
function.name: create_pr

arguments.title: feat: Add code review cycle microagent
arguments.body:
## Description

This PR adds a new microagent for handling iterative code review cycles. The microagent provides guidance for:

1. **Systematic Review Process**: After creating a PR and marking it ready to review, wait 5 minutes for Google Code Assist and other agents to provide feedback
2. **Retry Mechanism**: If no comments are received after 5 minutes, wait 5 more minutes and try one last time
3. **Comprehensive Comment Addressing**: Thoroughly review and implement all feedback from code reviews
4. **Cycle Management**: Close the current PR and open a new one to trigger fresh reviews
5. **Maximum Iterations**: Repeat the cycle for a maximum of 10 iterations

## Changes Made

- Created `.openhands/microagents/code-review-cycle.md` with comprehensive documentation
- Implements the code review cycle workflow as specified
- Follows repository conventions and testing requirements

## Testing

- [x] Microagent file created with proper YAML frontmatter and markdown content
- Follows existing microagent structure and format

## Purpose

This microagent complements the existing PR Ready to Review and SheepVibes Rules microagents
- Provides structured guidance for automated code review processes
- Ensures proper handling of review comments and iterative improvements

## Related Issues

- N/A

## Notes

- Follows all repository testing requirements and validation workflows
- Ensures code quality by running full test suite before each PR creation
